Interests

I like to make music and while my main instument is guitar, I also love to play the bass and drums but playing synths changed my life. I was on track to be a mechanical engineer when I fell in love with sound synthesis and the technologies that process sounds. Im very much into the digital DSP side as well as the analog side of building physical hardware.

In my free time I also enjoy the outdoors, skateboarding and playing music with friends
